features: Great For Sensitive Skin – Our disposable baby diapers are lined with super soft bamboo, which is naturally softer and kinder to sensitive skin than traditional materials.
Super Absorbent and Strong – Keep everything inside the diaper! Our baby diapers have been designed with patented Aqua Lock technology. Keeping your baby drier for longer.

Kinder To the Planet – By using bamboo instead of traditional materials to line our diapers, we are reducing deforestation around the world and reducing plastic waste. Our packaging is 100% recyclable.
Wetness Indicator – Developed with an indicator strip that changes to blue, to clearly show you when it’s time for a diaper change. Keep your baby always dry, with The Cheeky Panda!
body.description: Bamboo baby diapers for bouncing heinies! Our all-natural diapers are made from sustainable material and feature a soft and stretchy waistband, so your bundle of joy can move with maximum comfort. Boasting aqua-lock technology, your wriggly little one will stay dry for longer in between changes. Our diapeaers arrive in fully recyclable packaging to reduce excess waste, and they’re made with nothing but bamboo and a dash of aloe for skin nourishment. So, add all that together and you've got a super sustainable solution to potty training!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really, really love these diapers!! I cloth diapered my two older kids and tried with my third, but it just wasn’t working. She pees a lot and she’s extremely petite, so I couldn’t keep stuffing absorbent layers in the cloth diaper. She also has ridiculously sensitive skin and is prone to rashes. The cheeky panda diapers do not irritate her skin AT ALL, and they are super absorbent. She sleeps for 10-12 hours through the night and we’ve yet to have a leak. The fit is good, haven’t had any blowouts yet and the diapers are very trim. Baby-cakes is a very tiny 15 month old and fits in the size three. I would absolutely recommend these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This one's a keeper
reviews.reviewText: My now 2 year old has been wearing bamboo diapers since birth. My favorite was Andy Pandy, which is almost never in stock. I also like Dyper and Eco Boom (on left of first photo). Finding bamboo diapers has become increasingly difficult as he grew--supply issues, price gauging, etc. I decided to try Cheeky Panda because they were the best value when I needed to restock. We've gone through one package and so far, I think these are my overall favorites.I bought size 4, which says 19-30 lbs on the package but 22-37 on Amazon. For comparison the Eco Boom is XL 26+ lbs. As you can see, they look similar in size. My son is 27-28 lbs and has plenty of room to grow. CP has bigger wings on the sides, which I like--better coverage means no "Tarzan's loin cloth" look that happens with some of the other brands.Absorbency is great, comparable to AP, Dyper and Eco Boom. They've been 100% leak free for overnights,no blowouts, and no signs of diaper rash or irritation.They are so soft! At first, they seem thinner than the other good brands, but that's probably because of the bigger wings (be gentle when stretching the sides open). The quilted liner runs all the way from the front to back waist and does as good a job at keeping my kiddo dry.These are supposedly as biodegradable as the other popular brands, and although a lot of other environmental conditions factor into how well these diapers actually breakdown, I like to think they at least have a smaller footprint than non-biodegradable diapers. Plus, they don't smell like a perfume counter and they've kept my son rash free!Needless to say, I highly recommend these! I might even say they'll be my first choice from now on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars doesn’t absorb as well and causes leakages
reviews.reviewText: Im disappointed with these. The baby seems to be bothered with wetness after 2 hours of wearing them, so I can’t use them during the night. Also, almost each time baby poops, we had leakage. I really wanted to love these but Costco diapers are still a winner for us.
Beste Qualität und dabei noch so Ressourcen schonend wie möglich. Würde keine andere Marke mehr kaufen. Super weich, Saugstark und beste Qualität für das Geld.

reviews.reviewTitle: Li adoro peccato che ne ho comprato solo un pacco quando costavano veramente poco

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 23, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the bamboo baby wipes for cheeky panda now for over a year and was excited to see their new nappies. We have a 3 year old and the quality is great. I've tried a few other eco brands and had problems with leaks. No issues with Cheeky Panda even after a big 12 hour sleep no leaks. Very soft no nappy rash another winning product. Bravo.

Was soll man sagen, es sind halt Windeln. Bei uns laufen sie nicht aus und die Klebeteile halten auch, noch dazu fühlen wir uns ein bisschen besser, weil wir nicht 1005 plastikwindeln benutzen.. also was will man mehr. Wir finden sie super.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 17, 2021
